title: Early Super Bowl LIV Betting Preview, Who will Tom Brady & Philip Rivers play for in 2020? (Football 1/21)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by SportsLine expert Kenny White to give an early gambling preview for Super Bowl LIV between the 49ers and Chiefs (1:00). The guys discuss the spread, total and the best timing and approach for how to bet the big game. Then, Will is joined by Jason La Canfora to recap his time in Kansas City for the AFC Championship (25:00), analyze the futures of Tom Brady (35:45) and Philip Rivers (37:45), as well as Jason Garrett's fit with the Giants (46:15).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Kenny White to preview betting angles for Super Bowl LIV and by Jason La Canfora to catch up on insider notes around the league.
